contentrichtext.text: {{original research|date=January 2013}} {{unreferenced|date=January 2013}} The '''Naturist Action Committee''' (NAC) is a nine-member volunteer committee that functions as the political adjunct to [[The Naturist Society]] (TNS), based in [[Oshkosh, Wisconsin]]. While TNS is a national for-profit advocacy group for [[nudism|Naturism]], NAC is a non-profit donor-supported organization that promotes and defends naturist interests in the courts, before legislative bodies, at universities, and to local business communities. NAC board members are elected by TNS members on a three-year rotation basis. ==External links== *[http://naturistaction.org Naturist Action Committee] [[Category:Advocacy groups]] [[Category:Clothes free organizations]] [[Category:Naturism in the United States]] [[Category:Organizations based in the United States]] {{nonprofit-org-stub}}
